# Abelion Notes
> Personal Digital Archive with Sentinel-grade Security.

## Core Files
- [bin/abelion]: CLI entry point and TUI management.
- [src/aksara/Arsip.ts]: High-level encryption and storage manager.
- [src/aksara/Brankas.ts]: Cryptographic engine (AES-GCM & Argon2id).
- [src/aksara/Gudang.ts]: IndexedDB abstraction layer.
- [src/aksara/TUI.ts]: Interactive terminal interface logic.
- [src/app/page.tsx]: Main GUI landing page (Note list).

## Key Concepts
- Sentinel Standard: Client-side encryption using AES-GCM 256-bit and Argon2id key derivation.
- Poetic Indonesian: Naming convention for core modules (Aksara, Brankas, Gudang, Pundi).
- Local-First: Data sovereignty prioritized with local storage (IndexedDB) as primary source.
- Developer Vibes: Efficient terminal-first management tools for power users.
